staticPage.title: What is Delta?
staticPage.content:
Δ is an association for students of mathematical and physical sciences in the University of Turku. It’s activities are diverse. Delta seeks to support its members in matters of studies, familiarize students with each other, to be a link between the staff and the students, and to organize imaginative events. Parties, game nights, sauna evenings, sitsit and other events are being organized throughout the year. Excursions and cultural events take place on a regular basis. We also have our own paper, Potenssi, which comes out 4 times a year. The only way to get a complete picture of our association is through participation: so join in!

Contact us by sending an email to delta[at]utu.fi.
